channel.title: Changing ip to my no-ip on client help?
channel.description: when i search for either "no-ip" or "127.0.0.1" in the client.java it doesn't find either, i need this to change to my no-ip so people can connect but it doesn't find it, what else can i search for to change the ip?????

item.title: Changing ip to my no-ip on client help?
item.dc:creator: @Dick_Salad Dick Salad
item.description:
@Dick_Salad wrote:

try searching local host “192.168.1.1”

Read full topic

item.title: Changing ip to my no-ip on client help?
item.dc:creator: @WesLoz WesLoz
item.description:
@WesLoz wrote:

when i search for 127.0.0.1 it doesn’t find it, or no-ip, i searched for server = and thats what popped up, but I’m not sure which one to put the ip in?

Read full topic
item.source: Changing ip to my no-ip on client help?

item.title: Changing ip to my no-ip on client help?
item.dc:creator: @rspstutorial rspstutorial
item.description:
@rspstutorial wrote:

ok goto client.java and do CTRL+F and search for local host, 127.0.0.1 or no-ip. U will find it change it to your no-ip

item.description:

I’m new to this, but I believe this is what I’m looking for?

Gui.server = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(null, "New Server IP: ", “New Server IP”, 1);
